reviewText: One of the best movies I have seen in a long time. Been a John Abraham fan and follower from his very first movie and has seen him evolving as an actor through the years and have appreciated his making movies with meaning. This is by far his best work. Having grown up through the years of the LTF fighting and having had friends whose families which actually went through the war appreciate the raw and natural depiction of the trauma and reality of those years. Fantastic job!  A must watch for everyone!

If u are expecting an unrealistic thriller with stupid
Dance and actions and lot of  tears for no reason .
Then don't watch this movie  No dance ,no crazy action scenes
It's not the usual Bollywood clichs . BUT IT IS  ONE OF THE BEST BOLLYWOOD  MOVIE EVER MADE.
Who ever the director and script writers ,they done an awesome job . leading actor performance is so realistic .they way that they  done the movie difrent from other Bollywood movies .MUST WATCH
